decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing cards that benefit from having a high devotion to green mana symbols, enabling powerful effects and a strong board presence. By playing cards that add to green mana sources and utilizing cards with strong devotion effects like Leyline of the Guildpact and Invasion of Ixalan, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays and large creatures. Supporting cards like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Storm the Festival help to maintain card advantage and accelerate the deck's game plan. Ultimately, the deck aims to outpace opponents and secure victory through a strong green devotion strategy.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on fast-paced, aggressive gameplay to overwhelm opponents quickly. The deck includes efficient creatures like Soul-Scar Mage and Monastery Swiftspear, as well as burn spell support like Play with Fire and Wizard's Lightning. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds additional versatility to the deck. The deck also features lands that support the aggressive strategy, like Ramunap Ruins and Den of the Bugbear. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to apply constant pressure and quickly close out games with a strong creature presence and burn spells.

This aggro deck focuses on quick and consistent damage output through efficient and low-cost burn spells, backed up by aggressive creatures with haste and prowess abilities. The deck aims to keep the pressure on the opponent by constantly attacking with creatures and burning face when necessary, ultimately overwhelming the opponent before they can stabilize or gain control of the game. The inclusion of versatile lands and spells that can deal direct damage allow for flexibility in dealing with opposing threats and maintaining a fast pace throughout the match.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Narset, Parter of Veils to generate value and disrupt the opponent's plans. The inclusion of cards like Supreme Verdict and Portable Hole provide additional answers to threats on the board. The deck also includes lands that can provide utility and additional card draw. Overall, the deck aims to slow down the opponent's game plan and take control of the game's tempo to secure victory.
